import './App.css'; import React from "react"; import { Navbar, Container, Accordion } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { FashionBox, HandleClickFashionBox } from './components/fashion-box/fashion-box-redux'; import ChatBox from './components/chat-box/chat-box'; function App() { return ( 楓之谷轉蛋模擬器 {/* 時尚隨機箱 共花費{ }元 */} 網頁使用說明 按下購買並雙擊圖示開始抽轉蛋
) } export default App;
